name: Prince Cane and the Candy Kingdom
name_original: Prince Cane and the Candy Kingdom
description:
Hello, and welcome to the Candy Kingdom! Here, you will meet Prince Cane, an adorable little boy who is very excited for his little sister's birthday tomorrow! There's just one problem... Princess Cookie wants a BURGER, something that the super sweet Candy Kingdom has never heard of before! 

That's not a problem for Prince Cane, though! He will do whatever it takes to get the perfect present for his cute little sister, Cookie! Help him as he battles blue, yellow, and red gummy monsters, avoids dangerous traps, and searches all over Candy Kingdom to find the savory ingredients to make the perfect burger for his little sister's birthday present!
